Key Match Events: Arthur Masuaku scored a free-kick to secure a 3-1 win for DR Congo
Mohamed Bayo scored a penalty for Guinea to take the lead
Miscellaneous Highlights: DR Congo secured their place in the semi-finals of the Africa Cup of Nations
Others: Arthur Masuaku scored his third goal for DR Congo in his 26th appearance
Masuaku was at West Ham between 2016 and 2023 before signing for Besiktas
